org.drip.math.autodiff

Class ObjectiveFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.autodiff.ObjectiveFunction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpanInterpolator

    public abstract class ObjectiveFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    ObjectiveFunction provides the evaluation of the objective function and its derivatives for a specified variate. Default implementation of the derivatives are for non-analytical black box objective functions.
